text:
Hey there, here is a problem I'm currently trying to find a solution for... wondering if anyone has come across a resource for:

how to detect if a user on the site has completed a form previously, and then conditionally display custom modules depending on whether or not they've filled that form?
I recently did something similar - depend the filled out checkboxes i changed the landingpage. There I worked with URL parameters to have the values.

Hi there, here is the problem that the link incorporated in the module leads to "HTTP ERROR 400"
I have checked the url and it is weird that it was being rendered in the way which shown in the screenshot below (Red circled area)
